SELECT GROUP_NO, TOPIC_NAME, GROUP_NAME, OPEN_YN, GROUP_STATUS, GROUP_COMMENT, GROUP_DATE, -- 리더 이름 -- (SELECT MEMBER_NAME FROM MEMBER_JOIN J JOIN "MEMBER" USING(MEMBER_NO) WHERE LEADER_YN = 'Y' AND J.GROUP_NO = G.GROUP_NO) LEADER_NAME, -- 회원 수 -- (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MEMBER_JOIN J WHERE JOIN_STATUS = 0 AND J.GROUP_NO = G.GROUP_NO) MEMBER_COUNT, -- 게시글 수 -- (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM "POST" P WHERE P.GROUP_NO = G.GROUP_NO) POST_COUNT FROM "GROUP" G JOIN "GROUP_TOPIC" USING(TOPIC_CODE) WHERE G.GROUP_NO = #{inputGroupNo}
